people_also_ask.question: What is command example?
people_also_ask.heading: The definition of a command is an order or the authority to command. An example of command is a dog owner telling their dog to sit. An example of command is the job of controlling a group of military people. ... To direct with authority; give orders to.

def_list.definition: give an authoritative or peremptory order.
def_list.example: "a gruff voice commanded us to enter"

def_list.definition: dominate (a strategic position) from a superior height.
def_list.example: "the fortress commands the shortest Channel crossing"
